text: Allaha ka'uke tara sadhyatita kona kajera bhara dena na, se ta'i paya ya se uparjana kare ebam ta'i tara upara bartaya ya se kare. He amadera palanakarta, yadi amara bhule ya'i kimba bhula kari, tabe amaderake aparadhi karo na. He amadera palanakarta! Ebam amadera upara emana dayitba arpana karo na, yemana amadera purbabartidera upara arpana karecha, he amadera prabhu! Ebam amadera dbara ai bojha bahana kari'o na, ya bahana karara sakti amadera na'i. Amadera papa mocana kara. Amaderake ksama kara ebam amadera prati daya kara. Tumi'i amadera prabhu. Sutaram kaphera sampradayera birud'dhe amadera ke sahayye kara.
